document.full_text: the new york mets will begin the major league baseball season with outfielder jason bay and starting pitcher johan santana on the 15-day disabled list, the team said on thursday.
document.title: mets to open season with bay, santana on disabled list
lines_and_colors: the new york mets will begin the major league baseball season with outfielder jason bay and starting pitcher johan santana on the 15-day disabled list, the team said on thursday.
